reviewText:
If you found the plot of the original Pac-Man and Mrs. Pac-Man games hard to follow (I certainly did!), than this will explain a lot to you. Don't let the Christmas theme and the addition of Baby-Pac fool you into thinking this is any less a serious exploration of the Pac-Man Mythos. For those who say Hannah-Barbera lost it in the 70s and 80s, this cartoon provides handy evidence to the contrary.

Thank you Mr Hannah and Mr Barbera. Especially the one of you that's still alive.
